name: The Lalit New Delhi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lalit was our first port of call when doing the Golden Triangle. Very grand entrance on arrival with lots of security. We were given a large room on 21st Floor, even though high up the sounds of Delhi Station down below could be heard until 11pm and first thing at approx 6.30am so be warned.
reviews.title: Not 5 Star

reviews.text: Room was ok but in need of updating. Only 4 hangers and the usual basic toileteries supplied. Don't bother with the 24/7 restaurant, buffet which was vastly overpriced and not worth the money. The other restaurants looked a lot nicer and wished we had tried them.
reviews.title: the lalit, new delhi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The gym area was very good and someone on duty to help. My husband used the barbers which he was pleased with.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: The staff were very professional except in 24/7 where they could make more of an effort.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Namaste...I was there with a group of 30 other Asean journalists on a learning trip around Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore and Agra. Expecting it to be a rough experience I was surprised by the reception upon reaching New Delhi. Despite the tight secuirty (at the airport and entrance to the hotels), I must say the service was first class. The staff at the hotels, especially the Lalit in Delhi were very accomodating and the food, especially was superb. I'm a Malaysian who's so used to Indian food (curry and all) but in India the curry is just extraodinary and different from back home. My fellow journalists and I had a great time sightseeing and eating so much so that I had to undergo a special exxercise regime to reduce weight due to the excessive and enjoyable food. Look forward to going back.
reviews.title: Good, but too business
Noise, bad service, great swimming pool
reviews.text: It is a modern hotel with big restaurant, terrace, spa, fitness, big outside pool with heated water (3rd floor) some boutiques on 1st and 2nd floor.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are lucky you may be happy in this hotel, I was NOT.
reviews.title: Comfort and luxury in Dehli

reviews.text: My room (1036) was big, the bathroom was big and the bed too. It had a cattle, safe, bathrobe and slipers and this is where the list of superlatives ends. The room had a view on a wall. There was a high level of noise in the room so I thought the window was open, but it was not the case.
reviews.title: Experience Indian hospitality at its best

reviews.text: Tired upon midnight arrival, I adjusted air conditioning to min noise level and went to bed. Despite my earplugs I could hear during the night a constant noise ( ventilation outside?), towards the morning traffic noise was getting more and more distinct. At 05.30 it is a call for prayer from the mosque that joins in. I could not see any heavy curtains when I arrived, but apparently there were some hidden....behind the transparent ones. The minibar created such a heat that was well heating the safe placed above it. I was very hesitant if I should put inside my camera, mobile phones and IPad but finally they survived.
reviews.title: Good hotel from outside, but lack in service and moral (watch your bills!)

reviews.text: The restaurant is another kind of problem. Getting anything (coffee, fork, wine) takes from 10 min to eternity. Pity as it is a nice place. The choice at the breakfast is broad.
reviews.title: great experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at The Lalit beg Feb 2013.
reviews.title: Lovely Lalit !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice hotel - tasty breakfast ( good choices ).
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great pool - pool attendant lovely .
reviews.title: Exceptional service from concierge (Rahul Satmukhi)

reviews.text: Convenient location - can walk to Connaught Place .
reviews.title: Not worth the money u pay.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Housekeeping needs to be looked inot and so does the air con system.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: The hotel is good, clean and offers comfort for business travelers. Check in usually is swift. Coffee shop is okay .Restaurants can be better. Certainly below the mark. However , I have found service levels getting worse day by day. Rooms stink, basic amenities often not available..needs follow up to the front desk to get things done. Room service certainly needs a re-haul. However the biggest let down is network connectivity. If you are using any of the national network carriers..prepare yourself for poor cell connectivity, drop calls. Is a let down and frustrating for any business travelers. Repeated feedback to hotel management does not seem to improve .
reviews.title: Good but needs improvement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: HI, I stayed here for a night 20feb'13
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text: A very Plesant Hotel..With A huge Lobby !!
reviews.title: This place is not getting any better...

reviews.text: Very Diffrent From All Hotels
reviews.title: Good hotel- Excellent value for money

reviews.text: Cos the Owner Mr Lalit Suri Made it his way !!
reviews.title: perfectly adequate hotel - shame about the wifi

description: The LaLiT Hotels in Delhi, one of the best luxury hotels in Delhi India, stands tall right in the middle of city’s premier business and commercial district – Connaught Place. Being the central luxury business hotel in Delhi, it is located right next to lively shopping centres, office complexes and colourful streets, the hotel is 24 kms from the international airport and just minutes away from government offices, cultural centres and international trade fairgrounds. With the largest room sizes amongst all luxury hotels Delhi, The LaLiT New Delhi offers a total of 461 five star hotel rooms. The bedrooms are all well tailored to the needs of both a business traveler as well as a vacationer and accompanied by hotels modern amenities and elegant decor. Guests at our luxury hotels, have an option of choosing from a Deluxe Rooms, LaLiT Luxury Rooms and the suites. Serving cuisines from both the world of east and west, The LaLiT, hotels New Delhi offers four fine dining restaurants serving food to suit all types of palate. For those enjoying traditional Chinese food, The Woks serve authentic Chinese food while The Grill serves continental food. And if guests want to taste food prepared in the traditional Indian way, we invite them to try our Indian cuisine at Baluchi while our multi-cuisine restaurant and Bar – 24/7 is the best place for guests who enjoy food while also interacting with chefs of the restaurant. At 24/7 guests have an option of choosing variety of food at the buffet or being selective through the elaborate a-la-carte menu. At The LaLiT, luxury hotel Delhi, guests can be at comfort both at work as well as leisure. Ideal for all types of events, The LaLiT New Delhi offers a total of six banquet hall. Guests can organize all types of events with us - from small top-notch corporate events to private party events and from big conference meeting to huge wedding ceremony. Enough to accommodate upto 800 people, hotels' banquet facilities are added advantage amongst all hotels in Delhi. So whether the event is corporate or if it is a planning a wedding at hotels, The LaLiT New Delhi hotels offers just the right kind of banquets and meeting space for the hotels in New Delhi. Other world class hotel facilities at this 5 star luxury hotels Delhi include 24 hour Business Centre, Hotels Concierge Desk, Foreign Exchange, Limousine Service, 24 hour In-room Dining, Laundry Service, Valet Car Parking, Shopping Arcade, Doctor on Call, Rejuve – The Spa and a well equipped Gymnasium so that the business traveler feels more productive and rejuvenated. At Connaught Place, the center of the city - is The LaLiT New Delhi - an 18 story edifice with easy access to the city’s commercial complexes, conference centers, shopping hubs and historic sights. Wonderful interiors, immaculate service and fine cuisine combine to make The LaiLiT New Delhi is an eventful address of the city. Amongst other five star hotels Delhi this luxury hotel is within close proximity to historical landmarks like India Gate, Jama Masjid and Red Fort. Located at the city center, The Lalit New Delhi is just 35 minute drive from the airport and is merely 5 minute from the railway station. The city is well connected through air and rail links apart from two of the national highways which connect New Delhi to all the major cities in the country. The Hotel is also 10 minute drive from the trade fair ground and merely 15 minute drive from several embassies.
